name: Sins of the Gods
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: As a sinner, Ying Tian and his tribe were imprisoned in the City of Sinners with collars that restricted their supernatural powers. However, Ying Tian was told that he was the descendent of a god. Just when Ying Tian was confused, an unexpected disaster destroyed the entire City of Sinners, leaving no one alive.
